p: Both the EOs showed to have significant antibacterial activity, the intensity of which varied depending on the microbial strain ( F 4, 139 = 11.745; P < 0.001) and the EO concentration ( F 1, 139 = 239.925; P < 0.001) but not on the EO ( F 1, 139 = 0.320; P = 0.857) and with no significant interaction between the EO and the microbial strain ( F 4, 139 = 1.591; P = 0.180).
